comments: I had Dr. Lingameni for 2 classes SOCS Independent Sudy Course in Research and Criminal Justice Senior Seminar Course. He recommends to take research, Statistics, or analytical reasoning before Senior Seminar that\'s if your interested in Quantitative work. Usually the police officers don\'t like taking survey\'s. I like doing the qualitative part.

many students in my class had problem with the teacher and his assignments. he didnt tell us in advance what is the main concern of that course, he gave us a 7 day time frame to do interviews and find responders(where its impossible to find for example 15 sheriffs who are willing to talk to you)and 7 days to write a research paper.

If you want an A take this class, he is very nice & helpful. The only thing he asks is to show up to class because attendance is important. All there is to this class is going to class & do the assignment he assigns which is not difficult. In general, the class is interesting because he knows what he is talking about & take you will not regret it.
